PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-14912018-11-29,  ,  ,  NRCAN, 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectMany Islands Pipe Lines (Canada) Limited - Amending Order AO-003-GC-47
PrecisOrder Approving the ISSUANCE by the National Energy Board of Amending Order AO-003-GC-47 to MANY ISLANDS PIPE LINES (CANADA) LIMITED in order to authorize the bi-directional flow of natural gas on the Loomis Herbert Pipeline, and the construction and operation of the Herbert Block Valve.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Many Islands Pipe Lines (Canada) Limited - Amending Order AO-003-GC-47
precis: Order Approving the ISSUANCE by the National Energy Board of Amending Order AO-003-GC-47 to MANY ISLANDS PIPE LINES (CANADA) LIMITED in order to authorize the bi-directional flow of natural gas on the Loomis Herbert Pipeline, and the construction and operation of the Herbert Block Valve.
